name: Air Galore
about: At Air Galore, we offer a comprehensive aviation experience, combining charter flights, car and bike rentals, and a robust ground and flight school program. Our facilities, located at various airports such as Jackson, Auburn, and Lincoln, provide students with a well-rounded education in aviation. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art training equipment ensure that students receive the highest quality training. We also provide valuable area information to help our clients navigate and enjoy their surroundings. With a focus on customer service and a commitment to excellence, Air Galore is your trusted partner for all your aviation needs. Whether you're aspiring to become a pilot or simply need convenient travel services, we are here to support you every step of the way.
